title: Vocabulary Learning Course for Working Professionals Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English vocabulary at the secondary school level
context.additional_context: Workplace-focused vocabulary acquisition program for professionals, emphasizing competitive learning activities using mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can memorize and utilize over 150 essential vocabulary terms required in workplace environments.
Achieve vocabulary utilization accuracy of over 80% through gamification activities in individual/team competitive settings
Maintain continuous mastery of learning content by achieving a 75% or higher correct answer rate in weekly formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
